NASA Openscapes invites you to join our annual [Champions Program](https://nasa-openscapes.github.io/champions), this year focused on “A welcome to [NASA Earthdata](https://www.earthdata.nasa.gov/) and [earthaccess](https://www.earthdata.nasa.gov/data/tools/earthaccess)”. Come expand your knowledge and use of NASA Earthdata, building on momentum behind the earthaccess python library and workflows in the Cloud. Events planned for Fall 2025 and Winter 2026.

**Dates**: November 13 & 14, 2025\
**Time**: 10:00 am - 1:00 pm Pacific Time ([find your local time](https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=NASA+Openscapes+Champions+Program+-+Fall+2025&iso=20251113T10&p1=224&ah=3))\
**Where**: remotely, via Zoom\
**Register (free)** via [Zoom](https://zoom.us/meeting/register/xqsatMPHT4qhp8l3CDGwgA) to get the meeting link.\
**Details**: [https://nasa-openscapes.github.io/champions](https://nasa-openscapes.github.io/champions.html)\
